sentences.en: A crowd was waiting on the quay.
sentences.cn: 有一群人在码头上等着。

sentences.en: He frequently painted labourers and barges along the quay of the Seine.
sentences.cn: 他经常画工和驳船码头一带的塞纳河.

sentences.en: Jack and Stephen were waiting for them on the quay.
sentences.cn: 杰克和斯蒂芬正在码头上等他们。

sentences.en: Queensway Quay will incorporate shops, restaurants and other amenities.
sentences.cn: 女王道码头将会融商店、餐馆以及其他生活便利设施为一体。

sentences.en: She had meant to drive down to the quay and rejoin the yacht.
sentences.cn: 她原打算乘车到码头重返游轮.

sentences.en: She silenced them by marrying Mr. Kearney , who was a bootmaker on Ormond Quay.
sentences.cn: 她嫁给了奥尔蒙德码头上的制靴商卡尼先生, 从而堵住了他们的嘴.

sentences.en: The narrow quay was encumbered by hundreds of carts.
sentences.cn: 狭窄的码头被数百辆手推车堵得水泄不通。

sentences.en: The quay looked like a long stone road going into the sea.
sentences.cn: 这个码头看起来像一条通入海里的长长的石头路.

sentences.en: The ship berth alongside the quay or come alongside the quay.
The splendid ship lay alongside the quay.
sentences.cn: 这艘极其壮观的船只停靠在码头旁边.

sentences.en: The steamer arrived at the quay with the tourists packed like sardines.
sentences.cn: 汽船驶抵码头,船上的旅客拥挤不堪.

sentences.en: There are all kinds of ships in a quay.
sentences.cn: 码头停泊各式各样的船.

sentences.en: They tied the ship to the quay with ropes.
sentences.cn: 他们用绳子把船拴在码头上.

sentences.en: We put off from the quay.
Which is the best way to get to the quay?

words.tran_cn: 码头使用费；码头税；系船费

trans.tran_en: a place in a town or village where boats can be tied up or can stop to load and unload goods
